effect.shortEffect: Halves damage taken from full HP.
effect.full: This Pokémon takes half as much damage when it is hit having full HP.

description.black-white: Reduces damage when HP is full.
description.black-2-white-2: Reduces damage when HP is full.
description.x-y: Reduces damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Reduces the damage taken by the Pokémon when its HP is full.
description.sun-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes when its HP is full.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
description.sword-shield: Reduces the amount of damage the Pokémon takes while its HP is full.
